facebookAccount.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36
facebookAccount.notes: Time the system automatically retrieves new cookies (in minutes). Set to null to disable. Recommended: 1440 (1 day) or 4320 (3 days). Requires email/password above.

notesLanguage: Change to your language using ISO 639-1 code. Available: vi, en.

whiteListMode.notes: Only the IDs in whiteListIds can use the bot if enabled.

whiteListModeThread.notes: Only threads in whiteListThreadIds can use the bot if enabled.
whiteListModeThread.how_it_work: If both whiteListMode and whiteListModeThread are enabled, the system checks both. If either matches, the user can use the bot.

database.notes: type = json, sqlite, or mongodb. Use uriMongodb for MongoDB. sqlite recommended. json is unstable.

autoRestart.notes: Time can be in milliseconds or cron format. Example: 1000, 60000, 86400000, '0 0 * * *'. null disables.

autoUptime.notes: Interval in seconds. URL is the endpoint to ping (used on glitch/replit).

autoLoadScripts.notes: Reload scripts on file changes. Ignore specific commands/events using space or comma.

restartListenMqtt.notes: Restart MQTT listener on error. Time values in milliseconds.

gmail.note: Notify via Gmail using credentials. Supports multiple emails, separated by space or comma.

telegram.note: Notify via Telegram. Supports multiple chat IDs.

discordHook.note: Notify via Discord webhook. Supports multiple webhook URLs.

notiWhenListenMqttError.notes: If enabled, notify when MQTT errors due to account issues. Configure each method.
